amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of any funding to enforce any restriction on remittances to nationals of Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds in the bill from being used to enforce any restriction on remittances to nationals of Cuba covered by the Code of Federal Regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 177 (Roll no. 332).
